comments.author: Bureau
comments.body: Welcome back the forum!If you have interesting and knowledgeable topics which you think will help others and start a conversation then please go ahead and share them. Do not just go ahead and copy/paste anything as the forum has strict rules for plagiarism. If you are using someone else content which you feel is relevant to your topic, then do give them due credit. If you use AI to generate content then you will get banned.These are some of the things that you should follow before creating a topic on any board.

comments.body: The new identity you use shows you as a Newbie here even though you said you previously registered here and then lost access to your old account.
